title: Playing With AFKs
body:
Idea: If someone AFK's after the remake mark, wouldn't it be a good idea if the team with the afk, loses the game, they dont lose any lp? (and the winners win the normal lp)
If the team with afk wins, they win more lp and the team that loses just loses the normal amount.
* It's not really fair if you lose because of that afk

replies.body: not a bad idea but people will abuse it
"Hey! look team. We are definitly losing this one. Someone AFK, so we can ff and not lose lp. We promise not to report whoever does, the enemy will also not report because they get free lp"
maybe afk can lose lp, idk
